text: My Love () is a 1940 Soviet comedy movie directed by Vladimir Korsh.Они нам еще покажутМоя любовь It stars Lidiya Smirnova, Ivan Pereverzev, and Vladimir Chobur. == Actors == * Lidiya Smirnova as Shura * Ivan Pereverzev as Lyosha * Vladimir Chobur as Grisha * F. Chernousko * M. Klyuchareva == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1940 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: My Love (1940 movie)
